long_description: Speed your recovery so you can tackle the next day head on! These bars are packed with protein and carbs for continual energy and muscular rebound. Designed for people who turn their everyday world into a gym, these great-tasting bars supply sound nutrition for demanding physical labor. 20 grams of soy and nut proteins help rebuild muscles and ample carbohydrates offer all-day energy. Entirely natural with 33% - 35% organic ingredients. Build your appetite by the boxful-order 12 bars for a full box! *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
